item.title: Animation in the command line - ./animation.sh
item.description: Introduction After finding out how much one can do with ffmpeg… I thought it would be the perfect tool for creating my abstract stop-motion animation I dreamed of for years. What I wanted to realize was simple: combining scenes of a series of high resolution photographs, including images of paintings and digitally edited material with various lengths, framerates exactly timed to a soundtrack. Ffmpeg is a powerful tool to convert audio and video files (among other things).
